Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Guest Editor of the journal "Risks" (ISSN 2227-9091) for the special issue "Implications of Brexit" http://www.mdpi.com/journal/risks/special_issues/Brexit

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Speaker at Euro Working Group on Financial Modelling, Rotterdam, Netherlands, “Life-cycle Asset Allocation Using Stochastic Linear Programming”
Speaker at Computational Methods in Finance Conference, Waterloo, Canada, “Life-cycle Asset Allocation Using Stochastic Linear Programming”
Speaker at International Conference on Stochastic Programming, Vienna, Austria, “Cash Management Using Multi-stage Stochastic Programming”
Invited Speaker at INFOMS Annual Meeting, Seattle, USA, “Life-cycle Asset Allocation Using Stochastic Linear Programming”
Speaker at Numerical Methods for Finance, Dublin, Ireland, “ALM Models, Stochastic Programming, and the Absence of Arbitrage”
Speaker at DGF 15th Annual Meeting of the German Finance Association, Münster, Germany, “Life-cycle Asset Allocation Using Stochastic Linear Programming”
Speaker at 6th International Conference on Computational Management Science, Geneve, Switzerland, “ALM Models, Stochastic Programming, and the Absence of Arbitrage”
Speaker at AAA American Accounting Association 2009 Annual Meeting, New York, USA, “Correlated Errors”
Speaker at 7th International Conference on Computational Management Science, Vienna, Austria, “Time-varying Inflation Risk”
Speaker at XI Workshop on Quantitative Finance, Palermo, Italy, “ALM under Time-varying Investment Opportunities”
Speaker at OR2011, Zürich, Switzerland, “No-arbitrage Bounds for Generating Financial Scenarios”

Speaker at 9th International Conference on Computational Management Science, London, United Kingdom (and session organizer), "A Simplex Rotation Algorithm for the Factor Approach to Generate Financial Scenarios"
Invited Semi-Plenary Speaker at Annual Conference of the German Classification Society, Hildesheim, Germany, "A Simplex Rotation Algorithm for the Factor Approach to Generate Financial Scenarios"
Organizer of the workshop "Scenario Generation for Financial Optimization", Free University of Bolzano
Invited Speaker Brown-Bag Seminar, Copenhagen University, Copenhagen, Denmark, “On the Relation between Forecast Precision and Trading Profitability of Financial Analysts”
Invited Speaker Brown-Bag Seminar, Imperial College, London, United Kingdom, “On the Relation between Forecast Precision and Trading Profitability of Financial Analysts”
Invited Speaker Brown-Bag Seminar, Vienna Graduate School of Finance (VGSF), Vienna, Austria, “On the Relation between Forecast Precision and Trading Profitability of Financial Analysts”
Speaker at XIII International Conference on Stochastic Programming, Bergamo, Italy (and member of scientific committee), "No-arbitrage ROM Simulation"
Speaker at Accounting and Audit Convergence 2013, Cluj Napoca, Romania, “On the Relation between Forecast Precision and Trading Profitability of Financial Analysts”
Speaker at 20th Annual Meeting of the German Finance Association (DGF), Wuppertal, Germany, “On the Relation between Forecast Precision and Trading Profitability of Financial Analysts”
Speaker at APMOD International Conference on Applied Mathematical Optimization and Modelling, Warwick, United Kingdom (and member of scientific committee), "No-arbitrage ROM Simulation"

Speaker at CMS 11th International Conference on Computational Management Science, Lisbon, Portugal (and member of scientific committee), "Where would the EUR/CHF Exchange Rate be without the SNB’s Minimum Exchange Rate Policy?"
Speaker at Euro Working Group for Commodities and Financial Modelling, Milan, Italy, "Analyzing the Swiss National Bank’s Euro Exchange Rate Policy: A Latent Likelihood Approach"
Invited Plenary Speaker at 2nd IMA Conference on Mathematics in Finance, Manchester, UK, "No-arbitrage ROM Simulation"
Organizer of the workshop "Asset Allocation under Parameter Uncertainty", Free University of Bolzano
Invited Discussant WU Gutmann Center Symposium 2015: Retirement and Asset Management, Vienna, Austria
Speaker at the International Conference of Operations Research, Vienna, Austria (and session organizer), "Analyzing the Swiss National Bank’s Euro Exchange Rate Policy: A Latent Likelihood Approach"
Speaker at APMOD International Conference on Applied Mathematical Optimization and Modelling, Brno, Czech Republic (and member of program committee), "Correlated Noise"
Organizer of the workshop "Pension Finance, Asset-liability Management, Asset Allocation under Parameter Uncertainty", Free University of Bolzano

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Principal investigator - project "Strategic Asset Allocation under Inflation Risk" (financed by the School of Economics and Management, Free University of Bolzano)
Principal investigator - project "Arbitrage-free Scenario Trees for Financial Optimization" (financed by the School of Economics and Management, Free University of Bolzano)
Principal investigator - project "The Relationship between Forecast Accuracy and Recommendation Profitability" (financed by the School of Economics and Management, Free University of Bolzano)

OECD (Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development) - project "Integrating Social Benefits and Financial Inclusion within Socio-economic Goals of Regions and Localities: The Case of Trentino Alto-Adige (Italy)"

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: PhD in Finance (Dr.rer.soc.oec) at the Leopold-Franzens-University Innsbruck, Austria
Grant Oesterreichische Nationalbank (grant amount EUR 71000) - "Life-cycle Asset Allocation Using Stochastic Linear Programming"
Grant Tyrolean Science Fund (grant amount EUR 15000) - "Life-cycle Asset Allocation Using Stochastic Linear Programming"
Grant Oesterreichische Nationalbank (grant amount EUR 85000) - "Life-cycle Asset Allocation. Comparison of Different Solution Methods"
Habilitation (postdoctoral lecture qualification) at the Leopold-Franzens-University Innsbruck, Austria
Supervision of the best thesis 2010 at the Leopold-Franzens-University Innsbruck, Faculty of Social and Economic Sciences - Grant sponsored by Wirtschaftskammer Tirol
Full Professor in Financial Engineering (professor with special responsibilities), Technical University of Denmark (DTU) - leader of the Financial Engineering group
EU grant (grant amount EUR 294162) - "Understanding Pensions in Europe"

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: PhD committee member (membro del collegio dei docenti) 2015 "Management and Economics on Organizational and Institutional Outliers" - Free University of Bolzano
PhD committee member (membro del collegio dei docenti) 2016 "Management and Economics on Organizational and Institutional Outliers" - Free University of Bolzano
Teaching PhD "Management and Economics on Organizational and Institutional Outliers": Seminar Theory Modeling - Free University of Bolzano

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Teaching - Leopold-Franzens-University Innsbruck, Austria - different Bachelor courses: Portfolio Management (years 2001 and 2002), Principles of Finance (years 2002, 2003, 2004), Financial Derivatives (years 2004, 2005)
Teaching - Management Center Innsbruck, Austria - Bachelor course: Finance for Non-profit Organizations (annually from 2005 onward)

Teaching and research - Leopold-Franzens-University Innsbruck, Austria (in part fellowship financed by Oesterreichische Nationalbank and Tyrolean Science Fund) - different Bachelor courses: Financial Derivatives (years 2006, 2007, 2008), Financial Risk Management (years 2008, 2009, 2010)
Teaching - WU (Vienna University of Economics and Business) Vienna Executive Academy, Austria - Course: Interest Rate Derivatives

Teaching - University of Liechtenstein - different Master courses: Asset Allocation and Performance Analysis (years 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015), Financial Risk Management (year 2016), Active Portfolio Management (year 2016)

Research and teaching - Technical University of Denmark - different Master courses: Introduction to Financial Engineering (years 2013, 2014), Financial Risk Management (years 2013, 2014, 2015), Hedge Fund Strategies (year 2013)

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Referee for: Algorithmic Finance, Annals of Operations Research, Computational Management Science, Computers & Operations Research, Decisions in Economics and Finance, Emerging Markets Finance and Trade, European Journal of Finance, European Journal of Operational Research, IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks, International Journal of Banking, Accounting and Finance, International Review of Economics and Finance, International Journal of Finance and Economics, Journal of Asset Management, Journal of Banking & Finance, Journal of International Money and Finance, Kredit und Kapital, Oesterreichische Nationalbank Jubilaeumsfonds, Operations Research, Quantitative Finance, SERIEs - Journal of the Spanish Economic Association, Risks, The Quarterly Review of Economics and Finance
PhD supervision of Agnieszka Karolina Konicz Bell, "Optimization-based Guidelines to Retirement Planning and Pension Product Design", Technical University of Denmark, Denmark
Full Professor in Financial Engineering (professor with special responsibilities), Technical University of Denmark (DTU) - leader of the Financial Engineering group
PhD supervision Thomas Trier Bjerring, "Tactical Asset Allocation", Technical University of Denmark, Denmark
Program Director (Direttore del corso) of Economics & Management (L18) at the Free University of Bolzano
Coordinator of the Quality Committee (coordinatore Presidio di Qualità) at the Free University of Bolzano
PhD supervision Andrea Rigamonti , "Asset Allocation Under Parameter Uncertainty", Free University of Bolzano, Italy
PhD Referee for the course "Mathematical Methods of Economics, Finance and Actuarial Sciences", University of Bergamo, Italy

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Joint research project on "Life-cycle Asset Allocation" at the Leopold-Franzens-University Innsbruck, Austria (financed by Oesterreichische Nationalbank and Tyrolean Science Fund)
Joint research project on "Life-cycle Asset Allocation. Comparison of Different Solution Methods" at the Leopold-Franzens-University Innsbruck, Austria (financed by Oesterreichische Nationalbank)
Leader of the Financial Engineering group at the Technical University of Denmark, Full Professor in Financial Engineering (professor with special responsibilities)
EU project (grant amount EUR 294162) "Understanding Pensions in Europe": joint project of the University of Liechtenstein, the Free University of Bolzano and the Danish company Schantz.

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Principal investigator - project "Strategic Information Disclosure and Persuasion - Financial Expertise By Multiple Analysts" (grant amount EUR 46000, Central Research Council - Free University of Bolzano)

EU project - responsible for the Free University of Bolzano (grant amount EUR 294162) "Understanding Pensions in Europe", partners: University of Liechtenstein, Free University of Bolzano and Schantz.
Principal investigator - project "Re-insurance of Hail Risks in South Tyrol" (grant amount EUR 199900, Central Research Council - Free University of Bolzano)

Risultati ottenuti nel trasferimento tec.content: Member of the research project "Impact of Inflation on Real Estate, Commodities and Financial Investments" at the Free University of Bolzano, financed by Hypo Tirol Bank Italia SpA
